title: India Accused of Censorship for Blocking Social Media Criticism Amid Covid Surge
content:
1. India Accused of Censorship for Blocking Social Media Criticism Amid Covid Surge  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Twitter blocks posts in India critical of Narendra Modi's Covid-19 response  CNN
  3. International community steps in to help India as cases surge  Reuters
  4. As Covid Outbreak Rages, India Orders Critical Social Media Posts to Be Taken Down  The New York Times
  5. India ordered Facebook and Twitter to remove posts criticizing its poor handling of the pandemic  The Next Web
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

As Covid Outbreak Rages, India Orders Critical Social Media Posts to Be Taken Down  The New York Times
India ordered Facebook and Twitter to remove posts criticizing its poor handling of the pandemic  The Next Web

localize.title: インド、コヴィッドの急増に伴い、ソーシャルメディアでの批判をブロックしたことで検閲を非難される
印度被指责为审查制度，因为它在觊觎者激增的情况下封锁了社交媒体的批评意见
印度被指責爲審查制度，因爲它在覬覦者激增的情況下封鎖了社交媒體的批評意見
